Program.summary: The program counts the non-comment statements of code and writes the results to the console.

remarks.para: The statement counter considers any line that begins with a character in the set {'/', ',', '=', '*', '+', '-'} to be a comment or continuation line and it is not counted.

args[0] - The root folder path.
Starts at the root folder and recursively processes all files that match the file pattern in the contained folders.

args[1] - The file pattern. (Optional - Defaults to "*.cs")
If the pattern is "*.cs", any file with the word "designer" in the file name is not processed. This excludes the WinForm design code.

args[2] - The search strings. (Optional)
If this argument is included, the output will show all occurences of the search strings.

If the command is executed with no parameters, the command syntax will be be displayed.
"Syntax: LJC.CodeLineCounter rootFolderPath [filePattern] [findString]"
